00038 namespace affymetrix_calvin_array
00039 {
00040 
00041 /*! This class provides interfaces to store array information. */
00042 class ArrayData
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         /*! Constructor */
00046         ArrayData();
00047 
00048         /*! Destructor */
00049         ~ArrayData();
00050 
00051 protected:
00052         /*! A unique idendifier for the array set object */
00053         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType fileId;
00054 
00055         /*! An identifier to the type of data stored in the file */
00056         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType dataTypeId;
00057 
00058         /*! The step in Calvin that created the array set data. */
00059         CreateStep createdStep;
00060 
00061         /*! The name of the project that initially created the array set data. */
00062         std::wstring initialProject;
00063 
00064         /*! The date and time of initial creation. */
00065         std::wstring creationDateTime;
00066 
00067         /*! The user who created the data object. */
00068         std::wstring createdBy;
00069 
00070         /*! The arrays attributes for the arrays in the set */
00071         ArrayAttributesVector physicalArraysAttributes;
00072 
00073         /*! The user attributes */
00074         affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList userAttributes;
00075 
00076 public:
00077 
00078         /*! The unique idendifier for the array set.
00079          * @return The unique idendifier for the array set.
00080          */
00081         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &ArraySetFileIdentifier() { return fileId; }
00082 
00083         /*! The identifier of the type of data stored in the file.
00084          * @return The identifier of the type of data.
00085          */
00086         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType &DataTypeIdentifier() { return dataTypeId; }
00087 
00088         /*! The step in Calvin that created the array set data.
00089          * @return The step in calvin that create the array set data.
00090          */
00091         CreateStep &CreatedStep() { return createdStep; }
00092 
00093         /*! The name of the project that initially created the array set data.
00094          * @return The project name.
00095          */
00096         std::wstring &InitialProject() { return initialProject; }
00097 
00098         /*! The date and time of initial creation.
00099          * @return The creation date and time.
00100          */
00101         std::wstring &CreationDateTime() { return creationDateTime; }
00102 
00103         /*! The user who created the data object.
00104          * @return The user name.
00105          */
00106         std::wstring &CreatedBy() { return createdBy; }
00107 
00108         /*! The arrays attributes. Each array in a set will have its own attributes.
00109          * @return The vector of arrays attributes.
00110          */
00111         ArrayAttributesVector &PhysicalArraysAttributes() { return physicalArraysAttributes; }
00112 
00113         /*! The user attributes.
00114          * @return The vector of user attributes.
00115          */
00116         affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &UserAttributes() { return userAttributes; }
00117 
00118         /*! Clears the member objects. */
00119         void Clear();
